channel.title: Website Homepage - How do I make it sexy?
channel.description: So I've got a website that has literally noting on it atm, page wise. It's just been a host for files. Well I want to add a homepage to it but I don't know what I should do with it. Anyone got [serious] ideas on what I should do to make it look good?

item.title: Website Homepage - How do I make it sexy?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Man is completely correct. #TAGTEAM

Read full topic
item.source: Website Homepage - How do I make it sexy?

item.title: Website Homepage - How do I make it sexy?
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:18, topic:520679”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=639178.msg4308654#msg4308654 date=1370363982]

You make it look the least like the current MoparScape homepage as you can.

I saw your name and was like “this is going to be witty or he’s going to call me a moron”

And then you realised you were wrong and it was neither witty nor calling you a moron. Not from lack of trying, though.

Please stick to the topic Ruby, I’m trying to contribute to this discussion yet my train of thought has been interrupted by your spam.

To make it “sexy”, look at other sites with a similar theme to yours and look at their layouts/design - take notes on all of them and blend them.
[/quote]
pls dont ban me.

OT: Whenever I lack inspiration I just look around other sites with the same purpose and see what they’ve done and then kinda merge them into one with your current ideas. Take one aspect from here, an aspect from there. Usually works out fine for me.[/quote]

or come to me and we BUST THAT SHIT OUT.

Read full topic
item.source: Website Homepage - How do I make it sexy?

item.title: Website Homepage - How do I make it sexy?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:20, topic:520679”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=639178.msg4308690#msg4308690 date=1370368017]
Any good tips on making a page not piss people off? Ex: Not using auto-start sounds, clashing colors, etc.
[/quote]minimalism.

don’t worry about elegance or ui. just cut to the chase

http://www.benhulse.com/index.php
http://www.pixelumbrella.com/

either of those would be a great design for the things you want to show[/quote]
So I shouldn’t have 400 ads on my page and have only 10 of my items? Got it.

Read full topic

I don’t think I’ll need a nav bar. Unless I divide the types of projects.
A header logo would be good (Guess I have to ask the gfx section :P)
Any good tips on making a page not piss people off? Ex: Not using auto-start sounds, clashing colors, etc.

item.source: Website Homepage - How do I make it sexy?

item.title: Website Homepage - How do I make it sexy?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I’d still enjoy seeing:

[ul][li]Live Feedback Widget[/li]
[li]A navigation bar that can be adjusted/dragged to the side, top or bottom of the page.[/li]
[li]Color theme switcher[/li]
[li]Live social networking feed[/li]
[li]Collapsible Image Slider[/li][/ul]

Some ideas I just had, this time pertaining to the type of website you want:

[ul][li]Suggest a Signature[/li]
[li]Submit your own[/li]
[li]Gallery with categories[/li]
[li]Comments feature[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Website Homepage - How do I make it sexy?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You’ve got to remember, I’m not expecting super amounts of traffic. This site will get at most (I expect at least) 200 (unique) hits/month.

It’s mostly going to host past projects and some siggys.

Read full topic
item.source: Website Homepage - How do I make it sexy?

item.title: Website Homepage - How do I make it sexy?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Well, it would be beneficial to us if you could provide a concept of what the homepage would look like. I’ve always found that a webpage’s overall design/concept is important to whatever things you include in it.

Some things I’ve liked seeing in the past/I’d like to see:

[ul][li]Testimonials/Live Feedback Widget[/li]
[li]A navigation bar that can be adjusted/dragged to the side, top or bottom of the page.[/li]
[li]Color theme switcher[/li]
[li]Newsletter Signup[/li]
[li]Live social networking feed[/li]
[li]Collapsible Image Slider[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
